messages.subject: Re: Pagan Homeschool Websites...
messages.msgSnippet: A friend of mine has this site, www.goddessmoon.org  with a homeschooling section and if I ever pull my finger out, a breastfeeding page from me, (though if
messages.messageBody:
A friend of mine has this site, www.goddessmoon.org with a homeschooling section and if I ever pull my finger out, a breastfeeding page from me, (though if anyone else ever wanted to submit one I'm sure the webmistress would appreciate it :-) Just tell her I sent you, OK?

Tracy (that's without an 'e' <bg>)
----- Original Message -----
From: Brynn
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, February 09, 2000 6:18 PM
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pagan Homeschool Websites...


From: "Brynn" <panchot@...>

http://www.homestead.com/barbooch/PaganHomeschool.html

This is another good one.

Brynn~
"To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best night and day
to make you like everybody else means to fight the hardest battle any human
being can fight and never stop fighting."
--e.e. cummings



-----Original Message-----
From: Jenn [mailto:jbecza@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 09, 2000 12:27 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pagan Homeschool Websites...


From: "Jenn" <jbecza@...>

http://www.scruz.net/~jds/hs/pagan.htm

http://www.jazgordon.com/pparent/connections/maillists.html

http://homeschool.knotwork.com/pagan.spider

There's a few... I have more but can't find them at the moment.

Blessings,
Jenn
"Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish." - Euripides
<mailto:jbecza@...>


-----Original Message-----
From: Androdite@... [mailto:Androdite@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 08, 2000 10:36 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pagan Homeschool Websites...


From: Androdite@...

I would definately be interested in those pagan home school websites that
were mentioned...

Would ya mind passing them this way?

Thanks
Lhiza
